data.actual_result: The buttons appear behind the keyboard and go off screen when the keyboard is closed.
data.expected_result: The pop-up appears above the keyboard or at least appears on screen when the keyboard is closed.
data.short_description: [Mobile only] When you name changes to any of your applications on the Discord Developers portal , the buttons on the pop-up that says you have unsaved changes are covered by the keyboard and when you close the keyboard, the buttons go off screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Developers portal and click on "Applications". - Click on any of your applications. - Make changes like removing a character from the application's name description. - Observe the pop-up.
